import styled from "styled-components" import Announcement from '../Components/Announcement' import Navbar from '../Components/Navbar' import Footer from '../Components/Footer' const Container = styled.div`` const Wrapper = styled.div` padding: 20px; ` const Title = styled.h1` font-weight: 300; text-align: center; ` const Top = styled.div` display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: space-between; padding: 20px; ` const TopButton = styled.button` padding: 10px; font-weight: 600; cursor: pointer; border: ${props => props.type === 'filled' && 'none'}; background-color: ${props => props.type === 'filled' ? 'black' : 'transparent'}; color: ${props => props.type === 'filled' && 'white'}; ` const TopTexts = styled.div`` const TopText = styled.span` text-decoration: underline; cursor: pointer; margin: 0 10px; ` const Bottom = styled.div` display: flex; justify-content: space-between; ` const Info = styled.div` flex: 3; ` const Summary = styled.div` flex: 1; ` const Product = styled.div`` const ProductDetail = styled.div`` const Image = styled.div`` const Details = styled.div`` const ProductName = styled.div`` const ProductId = styled.div`` const ProductColor = styled.div`` const ProductSize = styled.div`` const Cart = () => { return ( YOUR BAG CONTINUE SHOPPING Shopping Bag(2) Your Wishlist(0) CHECKOUT NOW
Product:JESSIE THUNDER SHOES ID98765674 SIZE37.5
price summary
) } export default Cart
